captions.text:
• From intruders in the home living there
for months without your knowledge, to aliens

that rock back and forth on your front porch,
we count 15 frightening true stories from

the folks over at Reddit, a link to the full
set of stories is in the description box below

15 - Babysitter (bondmaxbondrock),
• A story about a girl asked to babysit

some kids - she sent them to bed around 9pm
and went off to do her own thing watching

TV and getting some homework done
• From inside the basement she heard rustling

and pans falling over - instead of going down
to check, she phones the police and informs

them there might be someone down there
• Instead of a single patrolmen turning

up at the house, an entire SWAT team breaks
in and searches the basement only to find

a man who happened to be wanted for multiple
cases of rape in the area - citing they heard

someone listening in to her police phone call
• Suffice to say, she was glad not to have

personally inspected the basement
14 - Shadow Girl (Decendent),

• This father is going through a divorce
and in the meantime he stays with his own

mother, who claims the house is haunted by
the shadow of a girl walking from room to

room
• Since he and his wife share custody of

his daughter, one some weeks she stays with
her mother, and others her father - one particular

week in the middle of the night, the father
is on the computer

• Out of the corner of his eye he catches
his daughter sneaking into the kitchen, where

she stops dead and stares at him for a few
minutes - but he doesn't look at her since

he figured she'd just go back to bed
• Which she did - and when he checked on

her a while later, he realised with a sick
feeling in his gut that her bed was empty

- she had been staying at her mother's that
week

13 - Hunter (LumosTheNox),
• This one father has a son aged about 4

or 5 called Hunter - when he gets bad dreams,
he'll climb into his parents bed

• One particular night the father hears
his son calling from the next room, only,

he doesn't say "dad", he calls him by his
full name

• When the father goes to check on Hunter,
asking what's up - he finds Hunter asleep,

and when roused Hunter merely says "Dad, when
they call you you're not supposed to answer"

• The next morning, Hunter doesn't remember
anything that happened

12 - Antenna (bigsol81),
• So reddit user bigsol81 claims that when

he was a kid, he'd be flicking through his
old television antenna trying to find a signal

• One day at around 2am, he found one with
a strange rhythmic crackling sound that went

for a while before cutting itself dead
• Instead a voice crops up to whisper, "It

doesn't work. We're already dead. We're already
dead."

• It took a few seconds for the words to
hit him, but when it did it freaked him out

- and though he claims it might've just been
someone messing around with a transmitter

somewhere else, it still scared the living
shit out of him

11 - Photo (spectre_alabama),
• A person vacationing in Ithaca with the

boyfriend - they stopped near an old suspension
bridge to take photos when a woman appeared

• She offered them to take a photo, but
they politely declined, the woman smiled and

kept walking - straight off the bridge and
onto the pavement far below

• There wasn't even a moment of hesitation,
almost as if they had no idea the path ended

there before plummeting to their doom
• It's also possible she felt so embarrassed

about getting rejected that decided to kill
herself

10 - Backseat Passenger (cranklowza),
• A nightshift worker who heard a shattering

of glass at his business, a rock someone had
thrown near midnight with no other nearby

businesses open that time of night
• He finished work and left in his car,

nervous that he hadn't caught the vandal yet
- he realised he hadn't locked the car, so

did a quick backseat hand sweep to make sure
nobody was there

• After he arrived home, he pulled out on
his bike to head to his friend's place when

he heard someone cycling behind him - he stopped
and saw a crazy smiling man ride past on his

mum's bike
• He heads back home to find the bike gone

and his backside car door wide open
9 - Taiwan Netcafe (smpx),

• A netcafe in Taiwan, where the elevator
conveniently forgets to include a fourth floor

for superstitious reasons
• One man entered the elevator to visit

the 6th floor netcafe only for it to stop
on a mysterious numberless door - pitch black,

random pieces of furniture strewn here and
there, in the distance a figure starts moving

towards him dressed in a white gown
• The light goes off in his elevator, the

doors close and it resumes the journey to
floor number six

• He consulted the cashier who claimed the
fourth floor used to be a hairdressing salon

before a series of accidents and unexplainable
events, the elevators were programmed never

to visit the fourth floor but on occasion
it did - and others confirmed they'd seen

the same robed figure approaching them
8 - Ogre Man (Walden_swirl)

• A 15 year old kid sleeping in his loft
bed at a mobile home in south california,

the screen from his window sill falls off
and he thinks nothing of it, but then a tattooed

hand reaches through to feel around the bedroom
floor

• This kid jumps out of bed and pulls a
knife out, screaming to get the hell out of

his room - his dad shows up but the tattooed
man vanishes into the night

• It was later revealed that the intruder
had been living under their mobile home for

quite some time, his own sleeping bag, water,
extra clothes and a hatchet - evidently plotting

his intrusion for a while, the family unaware
how close they came to getting hacked up in

the night
7 - Basement Child (PsuedoNom),

• A rundown house in a strange neighbourhood,
this kid finds a child's drawing underneath

the stairs in the laundry room - a family
of five with the caption "our new home"

• People who stayed at their house reported
a kid's voice behind them shouting "rah" to

try and scare them, but when they turned around
nobody was there

• One time his whole family were getting
ready to leave the house, but when his brother

asked if he could take a pepsi from the fridge,
a child's voice screamed "NO" directly from

the basement
• Nobody investigated - they just bolted

from the house
6 - Midnight Intruder (kamajo8991),

• A woman sleeping inside her house with
her baby son, round about 2am when she, with

her back to the door, heard someone enter
her bedroom

• The intruder shouted "ARE YOU IN HERE?",
all she could see was the intruder's reflection

in the window glass, then he shouted "FINE.
WHATEVER" and slammed the door shut

• She phoned the police and, after they
turned up, they asked her the frightening

question "who's been living in your basement?"
• They found sleeping equipment and other

stuff - but they couldn't tell when or for
how long the intruder had lived there

5 - Black Shadow (pajamathief),
• A shadow that seems to follow this one

guy, it first appears as a hot static in the
room, followed by a smell of cat piss and

finally, a black shape in the corner of his
bedroom staring up at him

• He falls asleep the next night and hears
a metal squeak noise - only to wake up and

find a chair next to his bed, as if something
had been watching him all night

• One night when he went out for a smoke,
he heard footsteps and a black shadow approach

him, to which he pulled out a knife and watched
it vanish

• Eventually he screamed for it to go away
- and it did - when he talked to his brother

about it, he confirmed that he too had been
visited by the shadow which paralysed him

with a stare
4 - Hidden Door (LadySmylee),

• A girl living with her grandmother and
aunty, when they heard strange noises coming

from inside the walls at night
• Figuring they might be rats, her grandma

moved some furniture that had come with the
building only to find a suspicious piece of

plywood which, when torn off, revealed a tiny
child-sized door

• Inside the door was a hallway and at the
end of the hallway, a room filled with dust

and a single chair in the centre - all along
the wall were three fingered gouge marks as

if a monster had torn the place up - and the
marks were fresh, no dust on them at all

• They resealed the door and never went
back inside

3 - Condoms (gibsonton),
• A friend who lived by herself while attending

college, came home one day to find clothes
were out of place, papers and things she couldn't

even recognise
• She called the police who turned up to

reveal nobody was there, but looking through
her computer they found hundreds of love letters

all addressed to her
• Each letter ended with the same words

"If you don't believe me just look under your
bed" - she did only to find 100s of used condoms

• They could never find out who it was,
but they always assumed it was a maintenance

worker with spare keys
2 - Alien (Krayken),

• A man waiting for his wife one night on
the weekend, washing dishes when the motion-sensor

light on the back patio lit up
• He grabbed a knife and peeked through

the curtains on his door to see a grey creature
squatting on the ground just out of the light's

reach, rocking back and forth - and as he
stared at it, the creature stood up fully

• What he saw on the creature's face made
him jump back in terror - giant red eyes too

big for its face, featureless and expressionless
• It approached the door, the man screamed

at it, the lights went off and the creature
vanished - he scoped out the backyard but

he never saw it again
1 - Little Girl

• A story my own Dad once told me about
a house we used to live in - he kept it to

himself for a long time because he didn't
want to scare my Mum into making us move

• Back when my sister was about 7 years
old she'd sleep in my parents bed, but one

night my Dad woke up in the middle of the
night to see something strange

• He saw a girl that looked similar to my
sister, a bit younger than her standing next

to my mother's sleeping body, staring down
at her looking extremely sad

• My Dad called her name, but she didn't
respond, and that's when my Dad realised it

wasn't her - she ran out the room, he gave
chase but she vanished into the hallways - he

checked on my sister but she was still asleep
• He swore to his dying day that she looked

exactly like another daughter of his might
look - staring down at my mother for who knows
what reason

comments.text:
I have a scary story....

So when I was younger I lived in a big, old and I mean really old house. My 
parents later split up but whilst we lived in the house I always got this 
creepy feeling that I wasn't alone. I used to get really paranoid so 
whenever I went in my room I used to turn music on my radio on to 'scare 
the monster's away'. Every time I did this i used to feel safe and I way 
able to shake off the feeling of not being alone. I am just going to add 
that I have only experienced two paranormal occurings in my life however I 
do not believe in ghosts. When I was about 4 or 5 my parents asked me to go 
and get something from my room. Now I'm not really sure what exactly it was 
they wanted me to get but it's not really relevant to the story. As usual, 
I ran up the stairs and switched on the music. It was winter so obviously 
quite dark. Therefore I also switched the lights on. Eventhough the music 
was on I had the feeling again. This was when it got creepy. All of a 
sudden the lights went out. At this point I was freaking out and just when 
I was about to sprint for the door, the radio switched to a strange station 
with a creepy, old man singing a nursery rhyme I can't remember. By now I 
was halfway down the stairs. I can't even begin to describe the man's voice 
it was like an extra terrestrial being of some sort. 

So on to the second story.

One of my other strange habits when's I was younger was in used to bolt up 
and down the stairs to the bathroom became it was so dark downstairs. One 
day I was walking down the stairs as usual when I heard crashes of pans and 
cutlery. I didn't realty want to investigate as I was rubbish at sneaking 
around. Frozen with fear, I just stood there listening. I closed my eyes 
because I was just overcome with fear. As I quickly flew up the stairs, 
still with my eyes closed, I heard someones or something whisper into my 
ear "running won't help you now". As fast as lightening I raced up the 
stairs to my room. The scariest thing was, the voice was the same as the 
man from the radio.﻿

comments.text:
Heres a true story called "Minerva's Revenge" 

A Mother aged 37 or 39 who's sister has passed away called "Minerva" The 
Funeral went on for about 8 hours, with the priest saying the same prayers 
over, and over again. When The mother askes one of her family members, the 
family member says "what are you talking about" and she did not reconize 
the prayers. While it was actually a rezuruction spell. Which all of the 
souls have been sent away. But the mothers soul has not been stolen. 
Instead Minerva woke up from her grave. And said "Hello Linda" (the mothers 
name) Linda was motionless. And Minerva Then cried blood. She says 
"you...you bastard!" "YOU GAVE ME NO RESPECT," "Of course I have!" Linda 
and her sister argued for 2 hours. Then she was about to damn Linda to 
hell. But at the exact moment she was about to be damned. Her soul was 
going to back to heaven. And evryone became alive, and does not remember 
anything what happened. After that Linda heard a voice that says "I forgive 
you" And she leaves behind the past﻿

comments.author: Hunter Coe

comments.text:
I don't know how.. about a year ago my body shook itself and jumped up in 
the air. I was shocked, ran out of breath, went back to sleep. But before I 
did that, I peeked over to my clock. It was 3AM. Told my friend of what 
happened the next morning. 

Jessica (my friend) : You know, bad spirits come alive during this exact 
hour. 

My backyard door was always left open. If sometimes I woke up for no reason 
I walked to the door and locked it. I got extremely mad at my parents for 
not closing it. They still didn't lock it no matter of how many times I've 
told them to. The door has nothing to do with this story. I read these 
comments. It's true. Your brain senses danger and presence around you. It's 
adapted to survive. 

Was something or somebody really around me? What was it doing? Who knows. 
The real question is.. 

Why 3AM? 

Goodnight.
﻿

lock

comments.text:
*Here's a scary story or event: I was takin' a trip to South America, when 
I happened to walk into an abandoned building at 2am like a sane person 
would. The place smelled like rottin' flesh, and I reached the 6th floor 
when I saw a fucked up restroom with at least 30 corpses, many headless and 
chopped up like raw meat. The moonlight helped me to see a bit, but I 
pointed my flashlight to a dark corner where a tall figure came from a 
stall, wielding 2 scythes, and I ran for my life outta the building thru a 
window on the 2nd floor, and I entered the forest nearby to hide in the 
foggy night, but the figure saw me from the distance, and I eventually lost 
it a mile and a half into the forest. Never again. Keep away from unknown 
places late at night, obviously, or be prepared to become Usain Bolt at 2am 
in ghostly stomping grounds....*﻿

comments.text:
This will probably get lost in the comments but here is a story about a 
story lol. 

At work it was a few days before halloween, and I was just working at my 
job. At my job we had little halloween stickers that we gave out to 
children, I had offered some to a little girl and she looked at her mother 
in hesitation and i wondered what could be the problem. The mother said " o 
we don't don't celebrate halloween," now we were in a pretty religious side 
of town so it was understandable, but then her mother says, "ya... mommy 
knows all too well how real that world really is" I just stood there, not 
knowing how to respond. She says "are you a christian?" i said yes i am, 
she says "o you're familiar with names in the bible and the stories in it?" 
I said a good amount yes. She said "well i used to practice witchcraft, and 
one night i had a dream of people disappearing from earth, everything was 
on fire and i was just walking down the street holding someones hand and he 
was talking to me about the destruction, he was telling me what was going 
on and then i asked him what his name was, He stopped, looked at me, and 
said Beezlebub, then we just kept walking. I woke up not knowing what any 
of it meant until someone over heard me talking about it and said that 
sounds awfully like the rapture in the bible. i said, whats that? I have 
never heard of it, and who is this guy with the silly name Beezlebub. The 
lady said.... Beezlebub? honey i think you should look into your dream. So 
i did read the bible, and realized what i actually had dreamt about. and 
thats why we don't celebrate halloween." 

Basically for those who are religious or not, she had dreamt of the second 
coming of Jesus and that she had been left behind in the fire and 
destruction with all the others. And the person or thing she was walking 
with, Beezlebub, is simply put, the ruler of demons.﻿

comments.author: JotalianLeague

comments.text:
So i was about 12 years old. It was summer so I went on my friend's 
birthday party( he was then 14). So there were a lot of kids, no parents, 
everything was fine. Then his dog in the yard starts barking like crazy. I 
asked "Whats up with your dog" and he said "Just ignore him, he is barking 
on a cat probably. We continued to having fun, but that dog thou was 
barking very long. And few minutes later he suddenly stops. We didnt 
noticed it at first but then shit got real.Younger bro of my friend started 
staring at the window. And I saw that in his eyes, he was so scared he 
couldnt even scream. We all got to that window only to se a strange tall 
man in a hood. We all started srceaming. We locked every door and window 
and called the police. That was the worst 30 minutes in my life. He was 
goning around the house, walking kinda oddly. One girl saw a hand print on 
the window, and we were hearing chilling sounds from the outside. When the 
police arrived, the guy dissapeard. Dog had a huge wound on his belly, he 
barely survived. To this day police didnt find the guy 
Sorry for bad english﻿

comments.author: troy Kingman

comments.text:
I had a similar one to the "rah" child... I was talking to my mom about her 
having a new boyfriend- no one else was in the house a bloodchilling voice 
screeched very loudly "no." I literally almost pissed myself when a similar 
story popped up, because I realized I had almost forgotten it (I was young, 
I believe my mind blocked it out) and to this day I swear, whatever it is, 
it is still around. I feel cold spots appear in my room constantly- and 
it's been in multiple houses so I know it's not a draft. It always happens 
around 11pm and 1:15am at almost those exact times and to this day no 
matter how much I crank up the heat in my room it still appears. I've cried 
myself to sleep, hiding under my covers praying it would go away and have 
even sometimes slept under my bed and fortified the edges with blankets and 
pillows when I was younger. Another time it was rather... active. I was at 
my friends house and it was, you guessed it, 1:14 and less than 30 seconds 
from 1:15 when car doors started slamming outside. We ran out to look (I 
was twelve at the time) and all the doors were open, as well as the tools 
in his dads tailgate crate being scattered everywhere in the lot. When we 
walked back in through the screen door, we heard a blood curtling scream, 
like an animal in pain, and we went outside again to find that the doors 
were opened. We ran to his room, he slept on the bed.. Where I was? 
Underneath it. He told that story to friends at school and the taunting 
from peers went all the way until I graduated highschool. I'm 19 now, and 
can't even sleep with the lights on. Because one night I saw the 
apparition- it was a small woman dressed in tattered clothes and had debris 
in her hair and gave off the smell of rotten food or something... Her 
"skin" was chunked away in places as if she had been floating down a river 
or been in the bottom of a lake- I really had no time for details. I ran. 
And ran. All the way from Eagle Creek Oregon to Estacada, until my asthma 
forced me to stop. Then I realized she had appeared near the creek that 
runs behind my house, eagle phern, and was terrified. There are no 
history's of drowning near my house... I almost felt a form of sympathy 
rising from me- as if she needed help.

This happened around the time my cousin drowned due to an undertow from a 
jetboat on the clackamas river... I can only pray that it's not her soul 
that may be haunting me. Sorry this was so lengthy, I swear I'm not lying, 
I've gone to counseling at red soils campus oregon city for this... Why 
would she still be here? I can't figure it out, I hardly knew her when she 
died (I was 7 and have memory loss from my younger childhood... And 
sometimes I get glimpses at it when I see things that are similar to it) I 
have never returned there, even though my parents still live there. And 
yes, they still experience unexplained events like I did, but refuse to 
move. Does anyone know why this could be? Any locals seeing this who might 
have a clue?

And to note, I remembered everything except the scream of "no" up until now 
and it took me almost 10 minutes of having the video paused for me to 
remember why it was so eerily familiar... It made my hair stand on end, 
even on my scalp. And as I'm editing this it is 12:12 and I can feel the 
chill on my back.﻿

comments.text:
Too many stories for me to share. I use to have this thing that happened to 
me. I'd be sleep and then it felt like I was awake but I knew I wasn't. But 
I couldn't move, and I'd be trying to really hard, but then there would be 
this sound like a snarling or growling but it wasn't a dog or anything, it 
was a weird growling sound, almost a hissing as well, and it would scare me 
so bad but I couldn't move and I'd be trying, and my brain would be 
tingling, it was odd. The snarling would get louder until I would 
eventually wake up. This happened to me twice but I don't know if it was 
anything real or just my body trying to fight me from waking up. It was 
definitely something that stuck with me though.﻿
